property.value: You may have Mariposa Military Base enter the battlefield tapped. If you do, you get two rad counters. {T}: Add {C}. {5}, {T}: Draw a card. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each rad counter you have.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unfortunately for Vault 34's remaining residents, a battle over the armory resulted in flooding, a leaking reactor, and broken doors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To the Divide they came. In the Divide, they rest." - Ulysses

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Master had literally built his army one mutant at a time. Humans, preferably with little radiation damage, were captured and sent to the vats.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Destroy all artifacts. • Destroy all enchantments. • Destroy all creatures with mana value 3 or less. • Destroy all creatures with mana value 4 or greater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Other Soldier creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance. When Captain of the Watch enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player sacrifices an attacking creature. You create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every squad of deathclaw hunters had a role for the newbies: bait.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Destroy all nontoken creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Synths are crawling all over the place! Thin them out before we drop!" - Proctor Ingram

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if that player controls more creatures than you, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if that player controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a basic Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature you control When Mantle of the Ancients enters the battlefield, return any number of target Aura and/or Equipment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to enchanted creature. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Aura and Equipment attached to it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Multikicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Creatures you control get +1/+1. When Marshal's Anthem enters the battlefield, return up to X target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of times Marshal's Anthem was kicked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. If X is 5 or more, destroy all other creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elder Nolan McNamara broke the Chain That Binds, starting the events which led to Hardin's coup.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all artifact and enchantment cards from all graveyards to the battlefield under their owners' control. (Auras with nothing to enchant remain in graveyards.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It may be time to leave, but I'll never forget the day you all entered Vault 76." - Overseer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card. Metalcraft - Equipment you control have equip {0} as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wear the armor. I am the weapon."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create X 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Patrolling the Mojave almost makes you wish for a nuclear winter."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player chooses a creature or planeswalker they control, then sacrifices the rest. Players can't cast creature or planeswalker spells until the end of your next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some fight to destroy their enemies. Some fight to destroy themselves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player At the beginning of each end step, enchanted player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards put into their graveyard from anywhere this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The king! The king has been murdered! It is regicide! Vault Boy . . . what did you do? What did . . . we do?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Radiation is an invisible tide that seeps into the bones of the land, changing it irrevocably.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact you control At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of enchanted artifact. Then if you control eight or more artifacts with the same name as one another, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the onset of the Great War, Nuka-Cola's best minds were reassigned to weapons development.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw cards equal to the highest mana value among artifacts you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Synth-kind welcomes you, as long as you welcome us."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature dies, put a charge counter on Black Market. At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {B} for each charge counter on Black Market.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's very little that merchants won't buy - and even less that wastelanders won't sell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Each creature that convoked Lethal Scheme connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)

property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield. Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everyone knew the bombs were coming. Everyone but the public.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one knew what the Zetans wanted. But whatever it was, it involved cattle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of each opponent's library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, twice that many +1/+1 counters are put on that creature instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Master discovered a new evolutionary path after tossing a human, a dog, and a cat into a vat of Forced Evolutionary Virus. He called his creations "centaurs" and unleashed them unto the wastes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it doesn't have the same name as another creature you control or a creature card in your graveyard, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They will give me the army I need to bring peace to the entire wasteland." - The Master

property.name: Rules
property.value: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wastes will toughen anybody up - even those who were already tough to begin with.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Permanents you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Another beautiful day in the most dangerous place in the world." - Nick Valentine

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target nonland permanent. You lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: James flooded the room with radiation, ensuring Project Purity would not fall into Enclave hands. With his last breath, he told his child to run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vault 87's Evolutionary Experimentation Program exposed subjects to an airborne version of FEV. Rapid physical enhancements accompanied sharp mental regression, and the oldest mutants would become almost feral.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or more - • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target creature. • Destroy target enchantment. • Destroy target land. • Destroy target planeswalker.

property.value: NCR's rangers were feared far and wide. Even Caesar's Legion respected them in single combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all nonland permanents your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was my responsibility to bring the torch of knowledge to the wastes." - Caesar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all artifact cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. They gain haste until end of turn.

property.value: Everyone thought RobCo's Assaultron reserves were decimated in the Great War. In reality, they were merely dormant.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mark of companionship, not subservience.

property.value: "It's not a perfect replica, but your skull won't know the difference."

property.value: The difference between surviving and living is joy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hunting mirelurks. Selling their eggs. It's not much, but it's honest work . . . for a raider.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only things you need out in the wastes are food, water, and bullets. Everything else is details.

property.value: "This is a great spot . . . . Traders run close enough for easy pickins, but not so close that we end up skinned." - Sully's Log

property.name: Flavor

property.value: Sometimes, just for a moment, the wind is moving gently through the trees, the brahmin are grazing beneath a blue sky, and everything is at peace.

You may cast a spell with mana value 3 or less from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {1}, {T}: Roll X six-sided dice, where X is the number of Bobbleheads you control. Create a tapped Treasure token for each even result. If you rolled 6 exactly seven times, you win the game.
